Special Powers
WARRIORS THREE, HOGUN: Sidestep. // When Hogun starts the game, if there are exactly 3 characters with the Warriors Three keyword on your starting force, this game those characters have "Damage dealt by this character can't be reduced below 1."
THE GRIM: Close Combat Expert, Exploit Weakness.

February 9, 2022
Thunderwebs
[QUOTE=Buckwheat;12182240]Wow, his attack value is -2 what it was, 12 years ago, when Volstagg and Fandral were on the map.[/QUOTE] If you're gonna compare then make the comparisons equal, otherwise what's the point? If all 3 are on the map then his AV will be the same on his mid dial CCE clicks, and one less on the other clicks. Fandral and Volstagg's AV will be one less than before, but all of their DV will be one more, meaning they all start with 19DV. And thanks to Hogun their damage can't be reduced below 1. And they all have sidestep (plus some other new powers), and you have 75 points left to fill out your 300pt team. Definitely an improvement over the originals, but by all means complain because their AVs are only great and not ridiculous.
